channel.title: Comments for Consulting WP – New York

item.title: Comment on Harvest great ideas from your company’s best assets by Jonathan Sugai
item.dc:creator: Jonathan Sugai
item.description: Within their ranks, many companies have people who are bursting with ideas and are often stifling within an environment that is pro-conformity, rather than encouraging brave, entrepreneurial innovations, entrepreneurial innovations.
item.content:encoded: Within their ranks, many companies have people who are bursting with ideas and are often stifling within an environment that is pro-conformity, rather than encouraging brave, entrepreneurial innovations, entrepreneurial innovations.

item.title: Comment on Harvest great ideas from your company’s best assets by admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Why shouldn’t an employee earn millions of dollars if his/her company increases its revenues by hundreds of millions of dollars? Makes sense to us.
item.content:encoded: Why shouldn’t an employee earn millions of dollars if his/her company increases its revenues by hundreds of millions of dollars? Makes sense to us.

item.title: Comment on Harvest great ideas from your company’s best assets by admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: At Consulting WP we take executable strategies like harvesting great ideas from employees and suggest that our clients use them in building profitable, growing businesses.
item.content:encoded: At Consulting WP we take executable strategies like harvesting great ideas from employees and suggest that our clients use them in building profitable, growing businesses.

item.title: Comment on Harvest great ideas from your company’s best assets by admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: You can learn more about how your business can become a Smiling Corporation by visiting Mr. Grood’s website or by purchasing his book aptly titled The Smiling Corporation.
item.content:encoded: You can learn more about how your business can become a Smiling Corporation by visiting Mr. Grood’s website or by purchasing his book aptly titled The Smiling Corporation.

item.title: Comment on Narrow Your Focus to Prevent Overanalysis by Mr WordPress
item.dc:creator: Mr WordPress
item.description: Hi, this is a comment. To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.
item.content:encoded:
Hi, this is a comment.
To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.

item.title: Comment on The art of the deal by Maria
item.dc:creator: Maria
item.description: I love grey hoodies! This is perfect with my grey Ninja shirt, when I get cold I throw this on and I can still be a Ninja.
